    • getIdFromColorAndDeckLocation

      public static int getIdFromColorAndDeckLocation(DeckLocation deckLocation, CardColor color)
      Parameters:
      deckLocation - The deck source, either DeckLocation.RESOURCE_CARD_DECK or DeckLocation.GOLDEN_CARD_DECK
      color - The CardColor of the first card in the deck
      Returns:
      The card id that corresponds to the stored image file path

      Returns:
